mapper.update: UPDATE SG_MEMBER SET MEMBER_DELDATE = SYSDATE, MEMBER_ONOFF = 1 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{MEMBER_NO} AND MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.RNUM) FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO DESC) AS RNUM, O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_MONEY, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_TRADE_TYPE, O.ORDER_TOPPING_NAME, O.ORDER_STATE, O.ORDER_GOODS_NO, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, D.DELI_INVOICE_NO, D.DELI_NO FROM SG_ORDER O, SG_GOODS G, SG_DELI D WHERE O.ORDER_MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND O.ORDER_GOODS_NO = G.GOODS_NO AND O.ORDER_DELI_NO = D.DELI_NO ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC ) A

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO DESC) AS RNUM, O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_MONEY, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_TRADE_TYPE, O.ORDER_TOPPING_NAME, O.ORDER_STATE, O.ORDER_GOODS_NO, O.ORDER_GOODS_AMOUNT, G.GOODS_NO, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, D.DELI_INVOICE_NO, D.DELI_NO FROM SG_ORDER O, SG_GOODS G, SG_DELI D WHERE O.ORDER_MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND O.ORDER_GOODS_NO = G.GOODS_NO AND O.ORDER_DELI_NO = D.DELI_NO ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ${PAGING}*( ${PAGINGNO} -1)+1 AND ${PAGING}*( ${PAGINGNO} )

SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.ORDER_DELI_NO, O.ORDER_MONEY, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_TRADE_TYPE, O.ORDER_TOPPING_NAME, O.ORDER_STATE, O.ORDER_GOODS_AMOUNT, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, D.DELI_INVOICE_NO, D.DELI_RECEIVE_ZIP, D.DELI_RECEIVE_ADDR1, D.DELI_RECEIVE_ADDR2, D.DELI_RECEIVE_NAME, D.DELI_RECEIVE_PHONE, D.DELI_ORDER_MEMO, C.SUM_ORDER_MONEY
FROM SG_ORDER O, SG_GOODS G, SG_DELI D, (SELECT SUM(ORDER_MONEY) AS SUM_ORDER_MONEY FROM SG_ORDER WHERE ORDER_DELI_NO=#{ORDER_DELI_NO}) C
WHERE O.ORDER_MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND O.ORDER_GOODS_NO = G.GOODS_NO AND O.ORDER_DELI_NO = D.DELI_NO AND O.ORDER_DELI_NO = #{ORDER_DELI_NO}
ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(A.RNUM) AS BASKET_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BASKET_NO DESC) AS RNUM, B.BASKET_NO, B.BASKET_GOODS_NO, B.BASKET_GOODS_NAME, B.BASKET_REG_DATE, B.BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, B.BASKET_TOPPING_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL
FROM SG_BASKET B, SG_GOODS G, SG_MEMBER M WHERE B.BASKET_GOODS_NAME = G.GOODS_NAME AND B.BASKET_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND G.GOODS_ONOFF = 0 AND M.MEMBER_ID=#{MEMBER_ID} ) A

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BASKET_NO) AS RNUM, B.BASKET_NO, B.BASKET_GOODS_NO, B.BASKET_GOODS_NAME, B.BASKET_REG_DATE, B.BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, B.BASKET_TOPPING_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL
FROM SG_BASKET B, SG_GOODS G, SG_MEMBER M WHERE B.BASKET_GOODS_NAME = G.GOODS_NAME AND B.BASKET_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND G.GOODS_ONOFF = 0 AND M.MEMBER_ID=#{MEMBER_ID} ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ${PAGING}*( ${PAGINGNO} -1)+1 AND ${PAGING}*( ${PAGINGNO} )

SELECT COUNT(A.RNUM) AS BASKET_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY W.WISH_NO DESC) AS RNUM, W.WISH_NO, W.WISH_GOODS_NO, W.WISH_REG_DATE, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, G.GOODS_PRICE, M.MEMBER_ID

WHERE W.WISH_GOODS_NO = G.GOODS_NO AND W.WISH_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND G.GOODS_ONOFF = 0 AND M.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} ORDER BY W.WISH_REG_DATE DESC
) A

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY W.WISH_NO DESC) AS RNUM, W.WISH_NO, W.WISH_GOODS_NO, W.WISH_REG_DATE, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, G.GOODS_PRICE, M.MEMBER_ID
